value.title: 4 Troubleshooting connectivity tips with the gateway
value.excerpt: This video was based on a call I had last week relating to troubleshooting connectivity to a SQL Server named instance from the Power BI gateway. This is really my thought process for how I handle connection errors to a data source from any application.    LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

value.title: Deploy Power BI dataset schema changes WITHOUT refreshing!

value.title: STOP refreshing a single table at a time! (Power BI Desktop)
value.excerpt: Stop refreshing one table at a time! Also, don't wait for the entire data model to finish refreshing. Refresh multiple tables within Power BI Desktop. value.title: Aggregated Table in Power BI   Using GroupBy Function in DAX
value.excerpt: There are many different ways you can create aggregations in Power BI, You can do it in the source (using the database t-SQL language), or using Group By operation in Power Query. You can also do it in DAX using some functions. One of the functions that can be used for grouping and aggregation is Group

value.title: Customer Retention in Power BI   DAX Measures
value.excerpt: Customer retention is one of the most common scenarios of data analysis, which is very useful for business. value.title: Get Data from Multiple Excel Files with Different Sheet Names into Power BI
value.excerpt: The ability to use Get Data from Folder in Power BI is a very useful option. However, if your sheet names are different in the list of Excel files, then you will face a problem.
